data.meta_description:
Im on set at WGGS Television in Taylors SC, ready to share some of the songs on my brand new CD, Pure Inspiration.  

#JohnathanBond
#PureInspiration
data.text:
TEXAS & LOUISIANA!!! Hey hey my Texas & Louisiana friends, I am super excited to see you guys this weekend!! so excited to share some of my new music with you guys. Of course, you know, have some stories to share from the road. LETâ€™S HAVE CHURCH AZLE TEXAS Friday August 30 11:00 AM Eagle Mountain Gospel Show 300 East Main St AZLE TEXAS Saturday August 31 3:00 PM Eagle Mountain Concert 300 East Main St START LOUISIANA Sunday September 1 10:00 AM Abundant Life Full Gospel Fellowship 6375 Federal Highway 80 RAYVILLE LOUISIANA Sunday September 1 6:00 PM Faith Christian Church 102 Cartlidge Road #JohnathanBond #DontHideYourScars #itsnotover

OH MY!! I just received a message letting me know that a Pastor friend, whom Iâ€™ve not seen in a few years, ended his life last night. ðŸ˜ž. We can definitely make a difference if we just love loudly and unconditionally. Depression is very real and uncontrollable, alone. ðŸ’”!!! If you were struggling with depression, donâ€™t do it alone. Reach out to someone who loves you and be transparent to them. Please know that will be a shoulder for you to lean on and I will be a friend who will walk through the darkness with you. Here is a song demo that I Co-wrote with Barbara Fairchild and Michael Lee, that says, HELP SOMEONE TODAY. WE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE!!
